name: Kankū Dai
description: Kankū Dai means 'to look at the sky - large', and in the first movement one directs the gaze upward. Kankū Dai symbolizes defending against eight opponents and is the longest kata in Shōtōkan (65 movements in total). Of the five kata that belong to shodan level in SKIF and are used as shitei-kata at WUKF championships (Bassai Dai, Jion, Empi, Jitte and Kanku Dai), it is also the most varied with several kicks, movements at all levels from lying down (ryote fuse) to jumping, left and right flying kicks (nidan geri) and a technically demanding turn after mae-geri to "manji uke" (migi jōdan uchi-uke – hidari gedan uke) in kōkutsu-dachi. Almost all movements in the Heian kata, created by Yasutsune Itosu, originate from Kanku Dai. This kata was Gichin Funakoshi's favorite and was previously called Koshokun and Kushankun after Kung Siang Chun, who is believed to have developed it. He was a Chinese diplomat sent by Emperor Ming and also an expert in kempo (Chinese boxing).

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, step out to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi)

moves.japaneseName: Ryō shō kasaneta mama hitai naname ue ni

subMoves.hiragana: りょうてひたいまえうえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Hands together - outermost of index and middle fingers on right hand overlap left. From here hands are led upward - gaze follows when hands pass. Opening movement to 'observe' and 'I have no weapons'

moves.japaneseName: Ittan ryō shō sayū ni hiraki – ryō shō kafukubu mae e

subMoves.hiragana: りょうてかふくぶまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Open hands to the sides, moving circularly down and gather them in front of the stomach with right hand edge against left palm

moves.japaneseName: Hidari haiwan hidari sokumen jōdan uke – migi shō mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Left jōdan knife hand block to the left in back stance (haiwan-uke also accepted). Hikite at solar plexus should point upward toward left elbow

moves.japaneseName: Migi haiwan migi sokumen jōdan uke – hidari shō mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Opposite side right jōdan knife hand block in back stance (haiwan-uke also accepted). Hikite at solar plexus should point upward toward right elbow

moves.japaneseName: Hidari chūdan tate shutō-uke – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり たて しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Pull up to shizentai - left chūdan vertical knife hand block, right hand pulled hikite to the side

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Same stance - right chūdan straight punch

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ひざくつだち
subMoves.description: With same arm - right chūdan inside block - weight shift to the left in a relatively broad zenkutsu-dachi-like stance. Hikite stays at the hip

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Shizentai - left chūdan straight punch

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ひざくつだち
subMoves.description: With same arm left chūdan inside block - weight shift to the right in zenkutsu-dachi-like stance. Hikite stays at the hip

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Pull up for keage - one leg stance on left leg, right foot at left knee, hands in koshi gamae on left side

moves.japaneseName: Migi uraken jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – migi yoko keage

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこけあげ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Migi yoko keage (while standing on the left leg)

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist jōdan strike

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Opposite direction left chūdan knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right chūdan knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward left chūdan knife hand block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi nukite chūdan-zuki – hidari shō osae-uke

subMoves.hiragana: おさえうけ / しほんぬきて
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left pressing block followed by right chūdan four-finger spear hand in right zenkutsu-dachi. KIAI

moves.japaneseName: Migi shutō jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – hidari shō hitai mae jōdan uke

subMoves.hiragana: しゅとうまわしうち / あげうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees anti-clockwise (⤿) turn into jōdan right knife hand circular strike and hidari shutō-age-uke in zenkutsu-dachi with gyaku hanmi hips

moves.japaneseName: Jōtai sono mama - migi mae keage

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん まえげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right rising front kick - upper body unchanged

moves.japaneseName: Migi jōdan uchi-uke – hidari gedan uke

subMoves.technique: Migi jōdan uchi-uke – hidari gedan uke
subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees anti-clockwise (⤿) turn into migi jōdan uchi-uke together with hidari gedan uke. The Center of gravity drops dramatically down into kokutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Migi shutō gedan uchi-komi – hidari shō migi kata ue nagashi-uke

subMoves.hiragana: ながしうけ / しゅとううちこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left deflecting block and right gedan knife hand strike in left zenkutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken gedan ni nobashi – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり けん げだん に のばし みぎ けん みぎ こし
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Slowly pull the left foot back to get up to left shizentai with feet almost forming the katakana "re" (ㇾ). The left fist in low position, the right fist at the hip. Make sure the right arm is pulled back.

moves.japaneseName: Migi shutō jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – hidari shō hitai mae jōdan uke

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん たてまわしうち

subMoves.description: Forward right back fist vertical circular strike in cross stance. Important that uraken and hikite are performed simultaneously

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left leg steps back - right chūdan inside block in right zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right chūdan straight punch in same stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi jōdan ura-zuki – hidari shō migi tekubi yoko-zoe - migi hiza ate

subMoves.hiragana: うらづき / ひざがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn right reverse punch with knee ready position in one leg stance. Arms move forward from each side of right thigh, left ends as support for right ura-zuki resting against wrist

subMoves.hiragana: りょうてふせ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎあしまえふせ
subMoves.description: With right foot forward, go down and place hands (formed as a triangle in relation to each other) on the floor - back foot rests on whole sole. Both soles are on the ground, gaze directed at a point about 4 meters ahead

moves.japaneseName: Hidari gedan shutō-uke – migi shutō mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり しゅとうげだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn low block with left knife hand - right lies hikite pointing at left elbow in deep back stance. Hips should be about as low as in previous position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right chūdan knife hand block in (normal) back stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Pivoting on the right foot turn 270 degrees counter-clockwise (⤿) into hidari chūdan uchi-uke in hidari zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right chūdan reverse punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Pivoting on the left foot turn 180 degrees clockwise (⤾) into migi chūdan uchi-uke in migi zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left chūdan reverse punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right chūdan straight punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだりあしだち
subMoves.description: Pull up to koshi gamae, hands at left hip

moves.japaneseName: Migi uraken jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – migi yoko keage

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこけあげ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Right side kick

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist jōdan circular strike

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn left chūdan knife hand block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi shihon nukite chūdan-zuki – hidari shō osae-uke

subMoves.hiragana: おさえうけ / しほんぬきて
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right chūdan four-finger spear hand in right zenkutsu-dachi - left pressing block on the way

moves.japaneseName: Hidari uraken tate mawashi-uchi – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: 360 degrees counter-clockwise (⤿) behind around self left jōdan back fist strike in horse stance. No excessive tempo changes in the movement

moves.japaneseName: Hidari kentsui chūdan yoko uchi – sono mama hidari ni yori ashi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり けんついよこうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Yori-ashi (glide in stance) to the left, left chūdan hammer fist side strike in horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ えんぴまえうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right chūdan elbow strike to the left in horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Look opposite - hands in koshi gamae on left side

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right low level block - still in horse stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken gedan uke – migi ken furiage

subMoves.technique: Ryō ude mawashi uke / Sukui uke
subMoves.hiragana: りょううでまわしうけ / すくいうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり きばだち
subMoves.description: Turn on the right foot 180 degress clockwise into kiba-dachi. Both arms circular block (as if sweeping a kick). Right hand should stay on the right side of the head - should be positioned to strike directly down

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ おとしづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right dropping punch in horse stance - downward strike with right hand, back of hand outward, hand positioned behind left so wrists cross each other

moves.japaneseName: Ryō shō atama ue kōsa uke

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん こうさうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Pull up to shizentai - jōdan cross block above head with open hands, backs of hands toward each other. Practice sequence from kōsa uke so it can be performed fluidly

subMoves.hiragana: みぎまわり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: With right leg as pivot point, turn 270 degrees clockwise to right zenkutsu-dachi - hands in same position

subMoves.hiragana: じゅうじがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Hands lower down past jaw and in front of chest - close on the way - same stance

moves.japaneseName: Nidan-geri – migi uraken tate mawashi-uchi – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり とびげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: とび
subMoves.description: First kick in nidan flying kick combination. KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ とびげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: とび
subMoves.description: Second kick in nidan flying kick combination

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん たてまわしうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist vertical circular strike in right zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Pivot clockwise on right foot, bringing left foot beside it to face the front. Sweep Gedan with outer right forearm (fist down), then circle (big) both fists upward, crossing before face. In Hachiji-dachi, lower fists in front of thighs, backs forward.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
